website_summaries.verdict: A dome surveillance camera for those who want a very good image and the ability to zoom or pan remotely.
pros: Includes motion alerts, which can come to your inbox
Can record locally or to another type of cloud storage
App allows you to pan or zoom
Company has good support line if you need help
cons: The audio on this camera may tend to have a buzzing sound that is hard to eliminate

customer_reviews.title: Complicated directions for microphone
customer_reviews.text: Attached is the picture of how the microphone is to be connected in. Right side being powered microphone, and left side to camera harness of wires. You will need a male RCA to female 3.5mm phono adapter, then a 3.5mm male to 3.5mm male extension phono cable. The microphone I used was Microseven M7WP-MIC waterproof available from Amazon. Use the white side of the micrphone to connect the RCA adapter. Use the yellow wire on the side of the camera harness wires to connect other side. If this helps anyone, it's worth it. Had this camera since March 2018, and microphone would not work until now (August 29, 2018).
customer_reviews.author: Brian Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: FOSCAM has come a long way. This camera is sturdy and loaded with features such as position presets, auto-focus, three intuitively modifiable detection zones, activity schedule settings, and greatly improved access security. No cloud account subscription is required as the camera can record to the build-in micro SD card (order separately) and offers superb freely downloadable foscam multi-camera management software (available for Win or Mac). Camera runs 100BaseT allowing modification of the standard Ethernet cable to inject the device power (12V/max 2000mA) via the extraneous 4 Ethernet wires for cabled (non-wifi) operation via just the Ethernet cable. Camera offers superb image quality. No complaints, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Josef

customer_reviews.title: WiFi connection poor
customer_reviews.text: I love Foscam Cameras. This is my 8th one and all of them are fantastic. Except this one... It will not keep a signal and constantly drops out. The cheap $50 one is bulletproof and I have 10 year old cameras still working great. After multiple rounds with Tech service a new one was sent. This one is great, inside... If it is outside it cannot hold a signal. I put up the foscam $35 wifi non PTZ camera and it is much better. In my opinion, this would be a great camera if you put it inside or very close to your router but just not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: CPK

customer_reviews.title: DOA wouldn't connect to app/software
customer_reviews.text: Spent 3 hours trying to get this thing to work and no dice, would not connect wired or wireless, waste of time and money, returned it the same day and they are sending another one, guess we will see what happens there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible WiFi range
customer_reviews.text: The camera works great when it is wired, but as soon as I put it outside and try to use WiFi, I can't get any connection. The WiFi works fine indoors when it is less than 10 feet from my WiFi source. So it apparently has very low sensitivity to WiFi signals, I've tried a half-dozen different antennas with no improvement. I will call Foscam to see if there is a known problem with my unit.
customer_reviews.author: Bob T.

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: If I had known how good this camera is, I would have bought it much sooner. High-res pictures, PTZ capability, the works. I have about eight cameras around my house for surveillance, of different brands. This one beats them all hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Engineering Geek

customer_reviews.title: Dead Camera NO TECH SUPPERT
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these about a year apart the 1st one still works but has always had a a scratchy audio sound when playing back a recorded event. This second unit did not exhibit the sound but now just after a year the unit is dead... totally unresponsive! the android app is so buggy that I have to uninstall and then reinstall the app to view the camera's. I have a a total of 6 Foscam camera's that I have purchase through Amazon. I wonder if i will get a run around on the warranty of this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Works ok when it works.
customer_reviews.text: I originally thought the product was great, then it stop responding. I reset and it still failed. I ordered a replacement and it worked well for about 4 months, then started to show signs of water in the unit. I just looked at the picture today and it looked like something on the lens. When I checked, it was filled with water. I don't know how this much water is getting into this unit, it's on the side of a building and rain can hit it, but, it shouldn't be able to get this type of water in it. I get to find out what the warranty is like on the unit. Hopefully it has one!
customer_reviews.author: CG2U

customer_reviews.title: Cannot handle any function
customer_reviews.text: May problems: 1. Had to tighten wifi antenna bolt on camera before attaching antenna as it will spin freely and then break wire. Had to replace camera 2. Camera cannot handle any functions once set up. If you move camera angle, it pauses and disconnects from wifi, therefore makes PTZ function useless 3. Video playback causes camera to disconnect from wifi and cannot playback 4. Motion sensing not effective. 5. Camera stopped continuous recording, currently records 1 minute every 3 minutes. Returning camera. Very disappointed as I have 3 other indoor foscam that work great.
customer_reviews.author: Poizonus

customer_reviews.title: High quality outdoor PTZ Web Camera.
customer_reviews.text: This Foscam FI9928 HD Web camera is a nice complete outdoor security Camera that just needs to be screwed to a wall or post. The picture quality is excellent and has full Pan Tilt and Optical Zoom capabilities along with an excellent night vision option. Once it is Upgraded to the latest Firmware (1.11.1.13) it even works on the latetest MacOS Mojave and Safari 12 without the use of special plug-ins. I prefer the direct wired network ethernet option and have not tested the WiFi capabilities. It also works with the Foscam Pro App on IOS devices (with router port forwarding setup).
customer_reviews.author: John R

customer_reviews.title: I will not buy this brand again
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed for the price has trouble receiving Wi-Fi signal had to reset numerous times finally given up on it because I had to reset it so many times it’s become a pain in the ass than a asset I will have to take it down and replace it with something else
customer_reviews.author: Twisted Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Value, Build Quality, and Tech Support Very good
customer_reviews.text: I would give it 5 Stars if the software and motion detection area setting were better. The FoscamVMS software (for windows) is a little rough, but I contacted tech support via email, got rapid responses to my questions (thanks Zion Zhang) and was quickly able to get it up and running. Motion Detection in the camera only allows setting 3 rectangular zones. Playback from the SD cars is a record view only, no timeline view. (can't easily tell duration of recording) Mobile app is comparable to other camera suppliers Image quality, PTZ, Night Vision are all excellent. Build quality appears quite good, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: TDB

customer_reviews.title: Would have been just 'OK' if it worked
customer_reviews.text: When it worked it was basically OK, function-wise, but after several hours running, the picture would start to go green and pixilated; requiring the camera to be reset. The time kept also reverting to GMT, whether I set it correctly in Synology Surveillance Station or through the camera's own control panel. Tech support did not have any timely suggestions, other than what I had already basically tried. It was a waste of hours of install, setup and tinkering. I ended up buying an Amcrest that was more money, but was a world of difference better in picture quality, reliability (so far), pan/tilt/zoom range and smoothness, and it even spins infinitely rather than 355 degrees (stop-to-stop) like this Foscam.
customer_reviews.author: Tigger

customer_reviews.title: Long time fan of Foscam but this might be the last one
customer_reviews.text: I have always brought Foscam and recommend them to friends. I been using foscam camera with Blue Iris software for years. I love the ability to keeping all my video traffic in my network and not the cloud. The video quality is great and including night vision at least for the price, I don't use the Motion detection on the camera it's self. My biggest issue is now after 6 months I go move the Camera and I lose connectivity. It looks like there some type of short inside with requires me to turn off the breaker since it mount on my roof. Update Support contacted and in the process of RMA.
customer_reviews.author: nj28sharp

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Outdoor PTZ Cam!
customer_reviews.text: This camera has served me well for a little under 2 years. The night vision field of illumination far exceeded my expectations and the PTZ controls are smooth. The configuration options are useful enough to be able to program in your own X and Y points for the camera to return to. It can also be configured to patrol through multiple set points. The optical zoom is a real nice feature. Make sure to install this camera as high as you can as you are limited on how far the camera will tilt up. Also, check the antenna from time to time to make sure that it is not loosening up.
customer_reviews.author: JeninNY

customer_reviews.title: Junk x 4
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my 4th one. This last one was purchased in Arpril 2018....it's now November and it has completely stopped working. I know it's not my router because I have another wireless IP cam setup in the same area and it still works fine. The speaker hasn't worked all summer. I have the same connectivity issues that virtually everyone else on here has. I DO like how well the night vision is....it's incredibly good actually. But I am done with this model. Too much hassle....way too unreliable especially for $300. I just want my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Zastrow

customer_reviews.title: Great PTZ camera and incredible service!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a previous generation pan, tilt, zoom Foscam Fi9828W camera with this one. I now own three of them. Great cameras! I had a question about adding an external speaker and mic and sent an email to support@foscam.com. within an hour I received a response. Tracy Xia gave me the technical information I needed. I thank her for great customer service! It's not only the product that is important but the service provided as well. Glad I bought these cameras from Foscam!
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Not a true IP camera. Must use phone app.
customer_reviews.text: NOT a true IP camera. Must use phone app to configure. This camera will not acquire an IP address from a DHCP server out of the box. All of the other IP cameras I have acquire an IP address, and allow configuration from a web page. That's what I hoped this was, but it isn't. You won't be able to configure this camera without using a smartphone. I sent one camera back thinking it was defective before realizing it doesn’t work out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Qtr_Note

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera but
customer_reviews.text: Awesome camera 👌 !! Five star but one removed because WiFi antenna contact point loose so I tightened it & working well inside the house for about a week til I went outside install on carport after getting down off ladder tried to connect to WiFi but didn't work so back to the ladder 10ft replug the power cord then reboot it .. Not connecting !!! Back to the ladder & the wifi antenna loose again & now won't tighten !! Won't connect !!!! As for the Foscam app is great !!!!!! Other apps for PTZ security cameras won't stop panning
customer_reviews.author: Rodger B. Terrey

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: The claim is that this camera tilts 85 degrees. If true, that should mean 5 degrees below horizontal. That IS NOT true. What you see in the picture is as far up as the cam tilts. I had it mounted on a 10' pole and could barely see the top of a door 50' away on wide angle. When using 4x optical zoom, door disappears and you are staring at an ant on the parking lot. Then came the connectivity issues, constantly lost connection. I have several foscams and have been pleased. Foscam has changed, no tech support, now selling JUNK! DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Blair b

customer_reviews.title: Great picture, poor motion detection, no builtin audio detection
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is great and the zoom is wonderful. I wish the motion detection was way more sensitive as a lot of motion doesn't get recorded that other model cameras do capture. There isn't a builtin mic so if you want audio detection you will need to attach a mic. This camera needs to be mounted pretty high up (over 8 feet) as the camera can't point up much at all so that is a limiting factor for mounting locations. It would be nice if the camera was PoE compatible but it does work fine if you use a PoE splitter that way you don't have to mount the camera near power.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but not great.  And will not work with Alexa :-(
customer_reviews.text: It was relatively easy to set up, and works fairly well from both the app and the web. The focus can be a little slow sometimes, and I've not yet mastered all of the functions. The scan is kind of cool. However, all my cameras work with Alexa, and this one is supposed to - but it doesn't. There is no viable Skill available, and no telling if it will ever work - so if you are reading this Foscam... Also, getting wireless to work was painful - so I have it connected via Ethernet at the moment.
customer_reviews.author: Les

customer_reviews.title: Best outdoor wifi 4x opt zoom on the market
customer_reviews.text: Theres not a wifi outdoor ptz 4x camera that even comes close to this near this price. Believe, ive tried many. I own several and they are great. U will not be disappointed. The IR distance is above all others triple this price.
customer_reviews.author: S. Douglas

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PICTURE QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: This camera has a terrific picture quality with the ability to zoom and wide angle. Also a guard feature to scan the complete area. When in IR / darkness, the picture quality is also great. I have no connectivity issues with this model in wireless. I have discussed the connectivity of previous models with Yiko from Foscam Support and this seems to alleviate the issues i had before.
customer_reviews.author: darwayman

customer_reviews.title: A non working camera
customer_reviews.text: I do not know why this camera got such a high rating. It was very difficult to configure. It dropped off line constantly and failed to connect frequently. Not at all pleased, so I returned it and bought a better unit.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Cosby

customer_reviews.title: Overly sensitive
customer_reviews.text: I have the sensitivity set to the lowest setting but bugs and rain drops set it off at night. I would like an email notification instead of an app on my phone. The ability to set notification times would be nice. The free cloud storage is only 8 hours and that's not really long enough when I am out of town.
customer_reviews.author: David VanderSchuur

customer_reviews.title: Very good security camera.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this five stars on all categories. I would give it ten stars if Foscam will include 2 way talk like other brands have. The quality of the video night or day is very clear . I had to send a picture to the police of a person that was around my house. They were impressed with the clarity and detail of the picture.
customer_reviews.author: David Moore

customer_reviews.title: Greatest Unit Available for Price
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased five (5) Foscam Units since 2017 to 10-2019. This unit is by far an awesome unit, does exactly what the Manuf says and more. It's an outside unit and remains outside 365 in all kinds of weather, no failures and picture perfect clear. I contacted the Foscam prior to my purchase to ask about this unit in-depth. They kindly answered all my questions in depth. You will not go wrong with Foscam for a great durable product and backing from them. They do try to go the extra step for the customer. Thank You, Devin Jin for your very professional assistance with everything
customer_reviews.author: W. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cam after doing some research. I'm slowly replacing my Ring cams. For the money and quality I like this came better than ring. I purchased the cam as an open box. I've had good luck with Amazon's open box in the past. This time I had a couple items missing so I emailed Foscam customer support and corresponded with Tracey. She was very help by directing me to the items I needed. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Not Really Weatherproof
customer_reviews.text: I purchased several of these for my business, to use at different locations. I use these with other Foscam cameras and NVRs. After several months, the units were no longer weatherproof. They fogged-up inside and retained the moisture so they were unusable. See photos. Otherwise a good camera. Because of the location, the labor cost to replace or rework the cameras are at least $300 each. We still have a couple others that work fine. So close to being great.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Daniel

customer_reviews.title: A great dome camera, so far.
customer_reviews.text: This camera is being used in a unique application. I wanted an affordable dome camera that would allow looking at the sky as part of a weather website. The IP66 rating on the shell signifies that the device is waterproof. That certification gives me the confidence to mount the camera what commonly would be referred to as upsides down. Since installation, we've had a Tropical Storm, a derecho, and some crazy thunderstorms. The camera has held up well and no indication of water penetration. Fingers crossed for continued success.
customer_reviews.author: PaulZ

customer_reviews.title: Great customer support
customer_reviews.text: This camera is larger than i expected. Very Heavy and robust. Looks Like a military grade camera. Had an issue linking camera to wifi with my phone and Tony from customer service was extremely helpful at getting me up and running from my computer. I am sold on Foscam and will definitely look forward to more of their products. love that I can zoom and pan right from my phone or computer. Amazing this camèra does not have a mic or speaker thought the platform supports one being installed. When it rains the wifi is a little touchy. I will hard wire asap.
customer_reviews.author: Gentle Giant

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this camera and initially liked it, especially the night vision
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera and initially liked it, especially the night vision. Increasingly had lock up problems with it and finally it bricked itself doing a firmware update. Foscam was no help and asked me to send it back to them. Took me a while to get it unmounted and now no response at all from foscam. This camera may work better wired but I do not recommend it if you are planning a wireless setup.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: The camera's durability is very poor
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality of the camera is great, but various functions of the camera either function sub-par or will not function at all. Playing back the recording is not intuitive at all and in some cases will not even work. I installed two of the cameras at one of my buildings and within one year one of them went dead - will not even come on again.
customer_reviews.author: Augustine M. Boyce

customer_reviews.title: Backyard never looked better!
customer_reviews.text: Nighttime or daytime, you get a much clearer, sharper, BEAUTIFUL image of our backyard. The simple setup, the instant communication and ability to work via Third Party software (Blue Iris) make this my favorite camera. Whether for security, 'what's going on' or just plain viewing, THIS camera does it all. Much appreciated! Ed
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Solidly Built.Great Picture.  Wimpy Antenna.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this camera only a month or so but love it, so far. Built like a tank and looks it. Would wish for a longer, better quality antenna and upper housing that doesn't get in the way of using HD screws to mount it (instead of bolts). Time will tell how it holds up through a New England winter.
customer_reviews.author: 4Papa

customer_reviews.title: The night vision has been out for two weeks, That 196' of night vision is out the door. why?
customer_reviews.text: After paying this kind of money, I didn't think I would have any problems, all works well except for the night vision, it has been working great all along, but for the last two weeks it's pitch black at night, what's wrong with it, I think it should be replaced free of charge, not even five months old.. this could have easily gotten a five star... I received this at the end of August 2018..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: With a brand like Foscam, I do not expect to give anything less than 5 stars. I've installed a lot of great cameras from Foscam in the past across my dad's property and mine, and I can absolutely vouch for them. This camera is also compliant with Synology NAS devices.
customer_reviews.author: S Abdulla

customer_reviews.title: I bought this item in Feb 2018 and Its June ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item in Feb 2018 and Its June and the camera will not pan anymore. I have tired to contact Amazon with no luck. This item needs to be exchanged with a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Kittle

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: I have a few of these Foscam outdoor cameras and a few indoor and a Foscam NVR. Good, solid construction. Liked them so much, I recommended these for our homeowners association recreation area. Emailed technical support and I got an answer within a day. Thanks Devin for the help.
customer_reviews.author: Dgizzim

customer_reviews.title: This camera is really amazing!! I set in up in my garage ...
customer_reviews.text: This camera is really amazing!! I set in up in my garage where my dogs have access to during the day while i'm at work. The camera not only notifies me when it detects that my dog is in the garage, it allows me a full range view of the dog so I can track his movements. Its a cool gadget for those who have pets, they want to watch, but cant. I definitely recommend it, esp since it can be used for something other than just watching pets. The motion detection is pretty cool, because you dont have to always keep an eye out, you will get a notification on your phone when it tracks movement.
customer_reviews.author: Willie Mincey

customer_reviews.title: Cameras showed up and are of good quality. I did have issues trying to set ...
customer_reviews.text: Cameras showed up and are of good quality. I did have issues trying to set up the WIFI on the cameras but after a short call to Lyn with Technical Support they were up and running. Picture seems really clear, have not been able to use at night yet but seems like it is a really nice camera.
customer_reviews.author: C Wegener

customer_reviews.title: You need a strong wi-fi network, otherwise a good HD camera
customer_reviews.text: This outdoor camera is very handy for areas where you are unable to hardwire. It has great HD, color, night vision but even though we got a wi-fi extender which is a room away. The signal goes on and off for periods of time which leaves the area vulnerable. I haven't called tech support but I'll be doing that soon to see what else we can do. Don't get sucked in by Backstreet Surveillance. We bought an $1100 camera that isn't a good as this Foscam. This product is definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia T.

customer_reviews.title: Great product price and support.
customer_reviews.text: This is our second FI9928P. I love the ability to scan the yard then zoom as needed. With 8 Foscam cameras today they are a great pruduct and price. I recently emailed a question from the Foscam site. The response from Tracy was fast and very supportive. Tracy was great to work with!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen S. Price

customer_reviews.title: Amazing picture Day and Night!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this camera. The quality of the picture is amazing and we absolutely love the pan tilt zoom feature. We use the cloud service as well as the SD card for added protection but is not needed. Highly recommend this camera. We had a quality issue with the camera but after contacting Foscam they assured me it would be corrected. Thank you so much
customer_reviews.author: Barclay Components

customer_reviews.title: Weatherproof...  Not really.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second camera of this exact same model. I installed it outside and had it operational without issue. Then after the first rain both have failed. Now when I remove power and reapply it clicks for a second and then nothing. Will be looking for something else now.
customer_reviews.author: Clinton

customer_reviews.title: Great cam, great app, great support
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth Foscam camera and I purchased it based on the performance of the previous three, but also I love the app that organizes all four of my cameras. I have four other cameras that I use ip addresses, but much prefer the Foscam app. I needed a bit of assistance and Yiko was of great help with technical support. The night vision is great, the PTZ works great and there is a patch to give 90 degrees, up from 85 degrees in the listing. Using the app and the QR code on the camera, setup took no more than five minutes (using directions).
customer_reviews.author: George Blau

customer_reviews.title: This is a great camera. Allows you to cover a wide area with  a great picture.
customer_reviews.text: This camera was very easy to set up. It mates perfectly with the FAB28 Stainless Steel Waterproof Junction Box. I highly recommend this accessory for a professional installation. The camera has good wireless range. I put it on the peak of my garage roof and it still found my wireless. It is well made. Very Sturdy. I have used prior models that were only720p. This camera has an an awesome picture. I highly recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.author: R. S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome but....
customer_reviews.text: So this camera has a great picture, you can look all around and zoom, I really like it on my summer house, However; it stops working on occasion. To get it to start it has to be unhooked from the power which is a pain as I am miles away. Sometimes it will work for month other times just days really irritating. Too much money spent for a part time camera.
customer_reviews.author: Ammoshot

customer_reviews.title: Too big for my location
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for one to "discreetly" place under the awning of my shed to watch the pool and backyard. This thing was about the size of a street light. Definitely, noticeable and well within range of a baseball bat. Be sure you are aware of the size. I did not unpack it so cannot say much about how it was built or works. Seemed sturdy though.
customer_reviews.author: JKS

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good support.
customer_reviews.text: Had to return this one but Zion at Foscam support was wonderful in facilitating the return and replacement. The replacement camera is working great. I own a number of Foscam cameras and this is the best for outdoor pan/tilt and viewing.
customer_reviews.author: CS Nations

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: I've have been using Foscam camera's both indoor and outdoor for several years in the past. I decided to go with this model to replace a similar type of camera that had poor quality video. This camera gives me both great 1080 quality video and seamless rotation. Compared to other manufacturers the price was also lower for the same type of camera.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander P

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: Got the camera up and running easily, and I was pleased with the features and performance until there was a problem, and loss of connectivity became a major problem. I worked directly with YIKO from Foscam Customer Service, and he went out of his way to make sure that the issue was resolved to my satisfaction. At this point, I am very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: RegularGuy

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 of these for use as HOA community security cameras. They seem pretty reliable with good picture quality. Also lots of features/customizable options and nice iPhone software to control everything. My 2 key learnings on cameras like this are (1) make sure the WIFI signal is strong or add a booster (2) responsive tech support is essential since you will have questions and FOSCAM support has been excellent!
customer_reviews.author: JLB

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is what it all about
customer_reviews.text: This cameras is an excellent camera . But what is even better is the customer service that I received from Desmond Li of FOSCAM. I have several of these cameras and they perform very well. One of these cameras however failed three different times. And Foscam replaced it each time. My hats off to Desmond Li and Foscam for keeping the customer happy.
customer_reviews.author: Phil S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice all around
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Seamless setup. Works with blue iris. Heavy duty camera
customer_reviews.author: Dana Bishop

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this to anyone
customer_reviews.text: I received my Fiscal Camera and contacted their free 800 number. The lady guided me through the steps and greatly helped me immediately. I would recommend this to anyone. Their helpline is so wonderful!!! Thank you Foscam!!!! I can sleep well tonight knowing my house is well guarded! The lady That helped me was Love. She was very patient and very knowledgable. She took much time with me! Thank You Love!!
customer_reviews.author: dorpa

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera with fantastic picture quality
customer_reviews.text: I have a total of 8 cameras on their system. One of the PTZ cameras stopped working. I contacted Foscam & received a reply from a specialist Devin Jin. He had me reset the camera & change electrical but neither worked. The outcome is that I will have the camera replaced & they will take care of all the details. Thank You Foscam and Thank You Devin Jin Richard K
customer_reviews.author: Richard Kirshner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect design
customer_reviews.text: The camera is awsome! We installed the camera on the radio pole about 33ft up.The night vision is beyond expectations as well. The lights on the camera offer enough lumins to get clear images.
customer_reviews.author: Milch lee

customer_reviews.title: Foscam outdoor ptz security camera
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived with missing items. Once I was able to get hex key (allen wrench) of my own I opened camera to insert micro sd card. Camera was already damaged. Could not insert micro sd card. I will not buy another camera like this one.
customer_reviews.author: James J.

customer_reviews.title: Luna helped me out and did an awesome job! Camera wouldn't start and attach to my ...
customer_reviews.text: Just fixed an issue with camera. Luna helped me out and did an awesome job! Camera wouldn't start and attach to my network and she provided me with the documentation to fix issue!! Thanks Luna
customer_reviews.author: John Gallo

customer_reviews.title: The camera is awesome is even better
customer_reviews.text: The camera is awesome is even better, had great support from Mary, and found the technical support worthy of 5 stars. You will really enjoy this camera!
customer_reviews.author: D. Behrendt

customer_reviews.title: Great camera + app
customer_reviews.text: We use this to monitor an uninhabited family property. The image is clear. Good connection. This is our 2nd foscam and we like the app. Several family members are able to check in on individual devices. Love this camera!
customer_reviews.author: Pam Bunn

customer_reviews.title: great camera to keep tabs on barn yard
customer_reviews.text: This camera was easy to set-up and install. Customer support was great when i let the camera fall and broke the antenna for the wireless , Foscam sent a new one post haste. Desmond Li at customer service was great to work with. I will definitely keep Foscam in mind for all future security camera needs.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Z

customer_reviews.title: Rapid consumer support
customer_reviews.text: Our camera stopped working and needed to be reset and reconfigured. I was impressed by support specialist, Stephen, who replied very quickly even in these trying times. We had to iterate the problem multiple times but he stuck with me and I was ultimately able to get the camera re-connected and working well. Bravo!
customer_reviews.author: Doug Varney

customer_reviews.title: best cameras no problem
customer_reviews.text: This are the best camera I have ever got and the warranty department is the best I had email Yiko Deng he reply back to me the same day and ask me couple questions and had send me a replacement unit bicause one had fail this is like my eight unit never had any isues with the rest of them tnak you Yiko for taking all the time to explain how tontryvto reset the unit
customer_reviews.author: Wilson Wu

customer_reviews.title: Good Unit for the price
customer_reviews.text: The unit works well. Good price for the performance. The only knock is that you have to tilt the unit quite a bit to see a 75 feet way. Once tiled it does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so is pretty conspicuous. I could tolerate the size but the ...
customer_reviews.text: Real clear picture, even at night with IR LEDs on. Very large, so is pretty conspicuous. I could tolerate the size but the moving, zooming, and video had a 10 second delay when used with Blue Iris. I returned it as the delay made the "deluxe features" unusable.
customer_reviews.author: olyteddy

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This product is very nice! Easy to operate and seems to be of good quality but it's still too early to tell I only had it up and running outside for a week now.
customer_reviews.author: e

customer_reviews.title: Has a nice picture.
customer_reviews.text: Had a little trouble setting it up on my WiFi network. Would have liked it to be plug and play.
customer_reviews.author: oldssn

customer_reviews.title: FI9928P - great video and easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: I'm using 20+ Foscam IP cameras indoor/outdoor for my security systems at my homes in the US and in Europe. While I started with different brands, I finally migrated my Synology Server based systems to Foscam only. The Foscam FI9928P‘s are my preferred outdoor cameras and the Foscam R4 are my preferred indoor cameras. I like the Foscams because they are easy to set up, have a great video, and provide a good stability. In case there were issues, Stephen Lei from Foscam customer service provided me a prompt support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Junk , takes forever to connect and when it does wants to keep upgrading the same firmware over and over . Hard to connect to wireless too.
customer_reviews.author: DeeTee

customer_reviews.title: Working great. I question the tech support
customer_reviews.text: Working great. I question the tech support. Took 72 hours to get a call back, and I had to tell them what the fix was..........
customer_reviews.author: Bruce S.

customer_reviews.title: Performance
customer_reviews.text: Several reviewers have stated, that the tilt angle is only 70 degrees, not 90 as stated in the description. I have found that by raising the camera gently by hand, it is possible to gain on improvement in the field of vision.
customer_reviews.author: DaveLJ

customer_reviews.title: Great cameras
customer_reviews.text: Excellent image quality, easy installation. The app runs easily and well on my iPhone and iPad. I had difficulty activating the 1 Year of Free 8 hr alarm recordings, but technical support responded very quickly and resolved the issue. Excellent support from Yiko Deng of Foscam technical support.
customer_reviews.author: Steven D Thum

customer_reviews.title: Good WiFi security camera  with good features
customer_reviews.text: Huge improvement in picture quality for a WiFi ptz camera. Qulaity images without distortion, clear night vision pictures..It is much better than I was expecting for the price of this camera. I like the feature that I can rotate or tilt the camera to change the viewing area by my phone once connected.
customer_reviews.author: leon

customer_reviews.title: Very good camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a good camera with a competative price. Easy to set up. The 4X zoom works well, but because it is a digital (not a focusing lense) it does git a little pixely. I wish they had one with a bit more zoom, but this is pretty good for watching my horselot while I am away.
customer_reviews.author: Nairb Reklaw

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera to keep an eye on my bunnies. The night vision is good enough.The WDR function works well. You can't see a bright light when the camera is on thanks to that WDR. I am pleased with the image quality. Unlike other brands,there is no image disortion. I use SD card to record the views.It's easy for me to set it up.Recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: alex dawood

customer_reviews.title: The camera works better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: The camera works better than I expected. Just like some other reviews, the tech support is outstanding. Paul help me set it up and Romer took care of setting me up with SD card recording and settings. You can't go wrong with this company. Thank you Paul and Romer.
customer_reviews.author: Willow

customer_reviews.title: Pan is not 90 deg.
customer_reviews.text: I have several other Foscam cameras, and and had high hopes for this one. I had problems in two areas. Tilt, will not go to a perpendicular position, meaning it will not shoot parallel with the ground. Second it had difficulty with shading, in a sunny environment. It was returned.
customer_reviews.author: JohnO

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy
customer_reviews.text: Have bought numerous Foscam cameras but this one is a dud. Stopped working after 4 months, no motion detection, camera freezes when you try and move it and it goes offline with any change - don’t waste your time. And of course I can’t return it.
customer_reviews.author: dawnoftheages

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with Synology Surveillance Station
customer_reviews.text: Spent HOURS trying to get this on line with Synology Surveillance Station. Connects briefly, that disconnects for hours. Tried different bandwidth, resolution, bit rate settings, with no luck whatsoever. Works fine as a local view, but pretty worthless for remote viewing and continuous recording.
customer_reviews.author: Justin V Long

customer_reviews.title: Customer support is quick.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a NEW computer, and was unable connect to the cameras UI using browser Safarie. Customer Service Representative Stephen Lei replied to me within minutes of my request for support. Stephen, provided me with two possible solutions to get UI access to the FI9928P camera. I tried the first solution and it worked, I then proceeded with the 2nd solution (updating the cameras firmware), that worked also. - Fantastic, quick customer support.
customer_reviews.author: rcotter

customer_reviews.title: Easy install and quick mounting
customer_reviews.text: Great camera so far and was very easy to install and network compared to Foscams old set ups.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: It’s hard to know how high it has to be to see the horizon.
customer_reviews.text: It has a great picture, color is perfect. I use it just to view the lake when I am gone for6 months of the year. I was a nice experience dealing with Tracy the Foscam rep. Very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good camera to monitor outdoor activity
customer_reviews.text: I had trouble connecting the camera to the Barn network, but I called the technical support and worked with Chris to get the camera to connect to the Wi-Fi. He was able to do this in a short period of time. The instructions he provided were simple to follow and the camera works well. Now for the barn test, mounting the camera is next.
customer_reviews.author: Pacapoo farm fun

customer_reviews.title: Waste of your money
customer_reviews.text: Total waste of my money, if you don't pay the cloud service the money you invested is simply trow away. I am moving to ARLO cameras
customer_reviews.author: Abraham Costa Rica

customer_reviews.title: Ptz not reliable
customer_reviews.text: After 1 week ptz not working anymore.... chucking with foscam support else will return it. Not a good start for reliability !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: ankhensen

customer_reviews.title: No motion detection, no access to sensitivity adjustment, no usable SD  FTP password
customer_reviews.text: Home security. Live streaming video works very well. While streaming, live videos are sharp and clear. Motion detection is absolutely null and void. No access to sensitivity to correct this. Would not detect any motion from any given distance in front of the camera when set to record Snaps or Videos. Could not find a usable SD card FTP password. None listed worked.
customer_reviews.author: A Senior Citizen

customer_reviews.title: I still like Foscam
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Foscam and I have to say I am still satisfied. Picture quality is good but not perfect. I am lucky enough to have them all through ethernet so I don't know about the wifi use.
customer_reviews.author: genius

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: When you zoom in on something the picture or video is not zooned in. Have not been able to log in from laptop, so I cant set up port forwarding. Cam will not record to sd card. I thought with a HD cam you should be able to read a tag from 80ft but I cant, its only a 250k pic.
customer_reviews.author: William Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice Camera
customer_reviews.text: Camera was easy to install had a issuse with the ip viewer program called tech support talked with Tony who got me logged on in no time flat. So far the camera works well, we will see how it survives the cold WI winter.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after only 1 year. Very disappointed. Also, when it was working, it was not great. I felt it should have been much better for the money.
customer_reviews.author: D. Foster

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying Foscam Cameras for long time , this Foscam Outdoor PTZ 1080 P Wi Fi Security Camera is great . The last couple of weeks I was having some issues, I contacted Tech Support , and was able to get a great service. Thanks Yiko Deng for your your excellent and quick response.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for my set up.
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the Foscam. Most of my cameras are Foscam so know what to expect. Picture is good, but wish it had a dome so people would not know where it is pointing.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Support
customer_reviews.text: Camera is built solid with easy setup, however the intrusive ads must go. Their support staff is awesome, for example Tracy Xia made my experience a 5 if not I would give them a 3 for they push their cloud subscription and intrusive ADS.......WTF.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Coppola

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time
customer_reviews.text: This wouldn't work. Had trouble getting it up and running. Eventually had to just return it.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Didn't last long It was set up in a pole Had to buy a longer power cable It's down and out Buy a GoPro
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: It's feature rich and easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: This camera is a bargain for what you spend. It's feature rich and easy to operate. The HD picture is excellent. I needed support to view it on my browser. The support team is swift, courteous and damned smart. They earn all five stars!!!. Paul. The support specialist is awesome! Thanks Paul!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Clement

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I love the camera. I was upset to find that this one has been discontinued. Also, i can't seem to find the adapters to connect to a DVR????
customer_reviews.author: Michael Durham

product_meta.title: Foscam Outdoor PTZ (4x Optical Zoom) HD 1080P WiFi Security Camera - Pan Tilt Wireless IP Camera with Night Vision up to 196ft, IP66 Weatherproof Shell, WDR, Motion Alerts, and More (FI9928P),White
product_meta.description: Foscam Full HD 1080P Wifi IP Camera, Home Security Camera with 4xOptical Zoom, Pan&Tilt Surveillance Syetem with with Enhanced Night Vision up to 196FT, IP66 Waterproof, Two-way Audio, WDR, White
feature_bullets: Incredible Image Quality. 1080p at 25fps brings real 1080p smooth video experience thanks to powerful Ambarella chipset. 355° horizontal & 85° vertical rotation range cover a much bigger vision range. True 4x optical zoom captures more details of your viewing objects. Intelligent WDR corrects dark faces under heavy light to ensure a clear image in every lighting environment. Image Distortion Correction tech will fix common image distortion flaws.

Superb Outdoor/Night Use. IP66 level weatherproof design leaves you free of worrying about rain or dust in outdoor condition. This model uses a Sony Starvis sensor and deliver true colorful vision image during low-light condition while most of cameras can just show black/white image then. Night vision range up to 196 ft with the 6pcs high performance infrared array LED lights.

Security Matters. Detect movement and send notification to you through Email or smartphone App. Captured image could be stored in multiple ways like Micro SD card (up to 128GB, not included), computer, NVR, FTP, NAS or Foscam cloud. Easily configure your alarm schedule or block the area you do not want to monitor. New design makes installing Micro SD card so conveniently with just removing the two screws. Additional I/O socket could add other sensor devices to monitor your home in multiple way.

Foscam Cloud use US-based AWS server that is of high-level encrypted security and privacy protection. Foscam Cloud Storage plan protects recordings against any footage loss that could result from damage such as theft of the camera. 7 Days Free Cloud storage with 1 month’s validity is available on this camera, and NO data space limitation during the last 7 days. Able to view live or play back or save all alert captures and video clips on the cloud. More options for Cloud Storage are available.

Easy setup via iOS and Android devices by free Foscam App. Comes with Foscam VMS (Video Management Software), compatible with third party VMS Blue Iris & ONVIF recording devices, compatible with IE, Chrome, Firefox browsers. Also Works with Alexa (Please update the firmware to the newest version via app). Instant live view the camera on echo show with simple voice command. Contact us for any help by email support@foscam

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars464 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
